ConfiguredScoringItems.Name: Default Minimum Password Age

ServerScoringVariables.Name: minimumAcceptableValue
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: The lowest value permitted to pass the check.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: maximumAcceptableValue
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: The highest value permitted to pass the check.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: allowNotDefined
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Whether or not having no custom minimum password age passes the check. Enable this if the default system value is acceptable to pass the check.

ConfiguredScoringItems.DescriptiveName: A sufficient default minimum password age is set

ServerScoringVariables.Name: shouldBeRemembered
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Score if passwords are or are not remembered.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: fileMissingIsOk
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Whether or not the check should pass if the common-password file is not found. Enable this if the system default is acceptable.

ClientScoringVariables.Name: packageName
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: Name of the package to check.

ClientScoringVariables.Name: oldVersion
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: The version of the package that will be initially installed on the system.

ClientScoringVariables.Name: requireNoUpdatesAvailable
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: With this enabled, the check will only pass if the package version is different and if apt reports there are no newer versions to install. Otherwise, only the former is checked.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: packageShouldBeUpdated
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Score if the package is or is not updated.
